data.oai_dc:dc: Vector fields of the wake of Daubenton's bat flying in and out of ground effect

Contains .dat files with six columns containing the x,y,z location of the velocity vectors V-X, V-Y and V-Z. Accompanying .xlsx file contains the coding for each of the sequences regarding experimental condition and individual as well as flight characteristics such as flight speed, height above ground and wing beat frequency. The file Data.zip was created in Windows 7 Professional using the built-in "Compress folder" option and can be unzipped similarly on a Windows PC. You may unzip the file on a Linux or Mac OSX machine by accessing a command prompt, going to the directory containing the file Data.zip and typing ONE of the following commands: jar xvf Data.zip OR 7za x Data.zip
